thread.title: Capgemini India CEO Aruna Jayanthi promoted to global role
thread.title_full: Capgemini India CEO Aruna Jayanthi promoted to global role

title: Capgemini India CEO Aruna Jayanthi promoted to global role
text:
Capgemini India CEO Aruna Jayanthi promoted to global role 
Times Of India Saturday 24th October, 2015 
Aruna Jayanthi, CEO of Capgemini India, has been elevated as the global BPO head of the French IT company. Former Igate HR head Srinivas Kandula will take over from her as the CEO of Capgemini's India operations....
